item.title: Boosted By Out-Of-State Dark Money, Alaska’s Ranked-Choice Voting System Is Here To Stay
item.description: A 2024 ballot initiative seeking to repeal Alaska's ranked-choice voting system was narrowly defeated by 664 votes.

item.title: The Police Report About Pete Hegseth’s Alleged Sexual Assault Vindicates Him Of Criminality
item.description: All of the evidence indicates Pete Hegseth was pursued by a married woman who then regretted her decision to have an affair.

item.description: 'The DoD IG knowingly concealed the extent of the delay in constructing a narrative that is favorable to DoD and Pentagon leadership,' the letter says...

item.title: How Trump Can Make The Nixonian Dream Of 1,000 Nuclear Power Plants A Reality
item.description: As we grapple with the twin challenges of energy security and energy reliability, revisiting Nixon’s vision offers valuable lessons.
